Marcellus Vega (oc) is unfortunately host to a parasitic god known as The Idolmaker. I wanted to draw something to reflect the panic and awe of harboring something right underneath your skin 😇

When I do a critique with a friend, I ask them what they like about their own work and how they’d like to adjust or accomplish something new. The process is usually about figuring out how to identify, articulate, and then address their goals. What I like or dislike never figures into that process. 🤷

Not many people here are posting pro palestine stuff so I am sharing what I’ve shared on twitter 

Starting with the last Kufiyah factory in Palestine, which will inshallah take orders when the borders lift. Kufiyah are beautiful, soft traditional scarves and symbols of Palestine

www.kufiya.org

Hi #PortfolioDay
I'm Saly, an Afro Caribbean comic artist from Martinique :)
I worked for DC Comics, Image Comics, Dauntless Stories, Band of Bards, AHOY and a few others.

Happy #PortfolioDay !

I'm Cara, a Black Artist based in NJ. I create illustrations and comics and my hope is to find more short term projects and representation in 2024! I love color, making stories steeped in self-made mythos and fantasy, and of course, sparkles ✨️

I didn’t know #PortfolioDay was a thing here too!!

Hey pals! An update on my mom's situation. She has finally found a second lawyer to take her firing case but it means we have to increase the goal to €3500. My mom is also having her first surgery this Friday on her left shoulder. Please keep your fingers crossed for her.
